headline:
Special Agent - Homeland Security Investigations (HSI)
SWAT (SRT) Team Leader
summary:
Federal Criminal Investigator with 12 years of experience in fields such as: 
Identity & Benefit Fraud, 
Trade-Based Money Laundering, 
Human Smuggling/Trafficking,
International Gang Investigations. 

10 years experience as member of Federal Special Response Team (SRT), performing high-risk arrests/activities.

defaultPosition.description:
Conducts criminal investigations of violations of federal law with specialization in trade-based money laundering / drug smuggling.

Leader of nationally-deployable, high-risk, specialized tactics unit: Special Response Team (SRT). Operational repertoire includes close-quarters-combat, high-risk arrests, evidence escort, protective service details, firearms proficiency, maritime operations etc. Designated team sniper since 2015.

Responsible for overseeing training and development of local Special Response Team, as well as coordinating joint training with local, federal, and military entities.
defaultPosition.title: Special Agent / Special Response Team leader.
